name: Job Wars
description: Based off of the Classic 1970s game, Combat.  Job Wars is a simple Arena game where players choose a character of choice (just for appearances) and throw the tools of their occupation at other players.  There is a Single Player mode and a Multiplayer mode that players can choose from.  Controllers are Required to play the game and should be hooked up to the main PC.  You DONOT need a network connection to play the game to its fullest.
